title: Problems that no one can fix
body:
**Problems no one can fix**
I have a problem that no one can fix
Much like a problem of fixing sticks
If my team rages what can I do?
Should I simply just report them too?

Why yes, of course I'm upset
Whenever I join solo queue, I regret
the choices I make
Oh my life I should take

"But maybe just one more game", I pray
Another loss, what more can I say
"Don't give up" they tell me
Give up? Why not? It's already gg

I take a long break, then I come back
and once again, it is I ragers attack
for I was the one that caused them their "loss"
The game who they blamed I had tossed

They don't know, they don't care
to know what people can share
Youtube is a great source
To take a knowledgeable, learning course
From Trick2g to Spazie too
They can always get out saying,"Too-da-loo!"

Oh the problems no one can fix
If only they'd listen If only they'd mix
the different play styles that they *could* learn
but it's only a dream, that I only yearn

It isn't fun, IT ISN'T FUN
whenever you must run
They snowball so hard, yes they do
and after I say," another loss too"

Now I am nowhere near pro or good
but at least I **do** know where I stood
I stand for the Seasons that exist no more
I stand for the Freedoms that are not in store

"More opportunities!" Riot says
When most people can't even run graphics in Hi-res
Opportunities? No, more like options given
Opportunities, with more players like Riven{{champion:92}} 

Here are my problems! **HEAR ME NOW**!
To teach these people, not to herd them like a cow!
Then again, I look and it isn't Riot at all
It's always the people, the people, the people
who'll stay ignorant, and fall

-Lukasblade2

**[Behavior Worthy of a Champion](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751874-Behavior-Worthy-of-a-Champion)**

We have solutions where none may exist
Hidden and unlocked, their power persist
When your team rages, surely you can help
“We can do this!” you can roar with a yelp

Everyone gets upset, this is true
And sometimes soloqueue makes you sing the blues
Of all the choices you can take
Typing “I can fill” is a decision you may make

The “Play Again” button calls to you
Your stats call for that revenge too
“Remain focused” you dare say
It’s not over, so don’t lose your way

Walking away can calm your mind
Leading to patience, a glorious find
“It isn’t over yet” is your rallying cry
This game will not be decided upon a Summoners sigh

They may not know the secret measures
Allowing you to share hidden treasures
Lo’ and behold, youtube, solodmid.net and mobafire are wonders
They’re to teach and help prevent blunders

Oh the help and support I can provide
Negativity and pessimism you will not abide
You can show them the way to divinity
Positivity and optimism maxed to infinity

Some might say it’s only fun if you win
Can’t win them all, even in the tier of tin
Don’t push your luck in a game of teamwork
For coordination and cooperation is more powerful than BoRK
Most are not pro’s or legendary, nowhere near
Yet you know we must stand together in the face of fear
Whether Sona crescendos or Fiddle crowstorms
You stood triumphant engaging first with Alistar’s horns

“Strive for behavior worthy of a champion” we here at Riot say
[For we will support and help all who come our way](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us)
Opportunities for improvement will be provided
Opportunities that never need be divided

These are only some solutions we hope some hear
Honor compels us to teach and assist those near
It will always be a game of the players, by the players, for the players
Who will extend an had to support those who have fallen

Yes but 4v5 only works if your team is clearly better then the enemy team... that is if the MMR of the players do not reflect the actual player skill.  However in theory the matches are SUPPOSED to be even... or meaning that both sides "power" is the same.  If you take away one of them (especially from the start) you are behind by definition.  Unless you play far above your MMR it is not possible to win by mathematics.


Case in Point:  LCS.  Would a LCS team be able to win if 4v5?  Well perhaps if your Team SoloMid or CounterLogic Gaming vs last place team.  But I highly doubt that, in an even MMR (or in this case LCS standings) situations, lets say Fnatic vs Elements... that if one of them AFKed that they wouldn't stand a chance.  Just because something is THEORTICALLY "possible" doesn't make it likely, nor relevant.  Because the universe has the 1 in 1000000000000000000000000000+ chance of randomly self-destructing at any point in time doesn't mean it is going to happen ever.

Nor, for the purposes of more casual LoL play, does it mean that I should have to tolerate AFKing on such a frequent (20%+ of games... amazingly 90% of the time on my side only) basis.  Some of the AFKing situation is due to load-in errors that is RIOT's fault with recent releases.  Rest are usually people with bad interent connections, that in theory, shouldn't be playing LoL in the first place.


ANd if you are in Bronze... of course this is far more likely to ruin your day then anything else.  With the "soft resets" of S5 and formally S4 Gold/Silver being placed into B3 matches... well that just ruins your day.

You are right though, I do play seriously( which probably means that norms isn't for me to play all the time). This poem was written to blow off a lot of steam (it's been stored up as that is the person I am) since I tipped. 
Unfortunately I'm not the guy that everyone hates (unfortunately for you ^^), but I am glad you noticed my ridiculous poem xD. I also really don't care what rank I am either, I don't even understand how lp works xD. 
I'll give you a brief explanation since the vibe I'm getting from you is,"Oh great, another stupid bronze scrub"

First is the introductory stanza asking if you can solve this universal problem.
Second, This is the part where I blow off some steam as I was in a depressive state, it says that I regret joining solo queue sometimes
Third, It's my mentality whenever I join. Whenever I join queue it's hard for me to motivate myself to play, as usually people will argue in chat or rage in-game and such.
Fourth, Whenever I take a break and come back to play, I usually run into ragers who penalize and rage at the small mistakes I make. They usually always blame me or "turn their teeth" to bare against me.
Fifth, This is confusing to you in that while people do make mistakes it's like learning is hard for people. Whether it be fear to try the methods they have seen or just the disregard to try new things.
Sixth, It'd be nice for a change for people to mix and match their own playstyles, not with a certain champ, but in general( like whether you're a passive-aggressive player or an aggressive player straight up)
Seventh, This stanza explains that it isn't fun when people feed and I constantly have to run since I can easily get one shot.
Eighth, This stanza follows the seventh in that while I don't like feeders, I myself can be a feeder sometimes( as I am not even pro). It also expresses that I miss the old days back in Urf and wayyy back when where op fought op.
Ninth-ish+ that one line that doesn't fit with Riven, This is an expression that is pretty self explanatory, no offense to Riot( you guys are pretty cool people), I say Riven since the stereotype for many Riven players is extreme bravado.
Tenth, This is the end of the steaming, and redirects the blame to people like you and me who could argue forever xD and rage and flame. 

So in the end I don't mind noobs, or boosters(you can explain what those are later, Idk what those are :P), or trolls, or flamers( even a little toxicity is good, only a little though). I just want to enjoy myself without having to ignore these problems. So in the end, thanks for the response bro :D and please work on run-on sentences, please :).
